allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName ''System.IO.Compression.FileSystem''; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead(''homepage_analyse konkrete Formulierung(1).docx''); $entry = $zip.Entries | Where-Object { $_Name -eq ''document.xml'' }; $stream = $entry.Open(); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader($stream); $content = $reader.ReadToEnd(); $reader.Close(); $zip.Dispose(); $content -replace ''<[^>]+>'', '' '' -replace ''\s+'', '' ''")

Bash(powershell -Command "$word = New-Object -ComObject Word.Application; $word.Visible = $false; $doc = $word.Documents.Open(''C:\Users\morit\IdeaProjects\Eckert Enterprise\eckertdatein\7\Beispiel zu den inneren Fragen.docx''); $doc.Content.Text; $doc.Close(); $word.Quit()")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { $word = New-Object -ComObject Word.Application; $word.Visible = [bool]$false; $doc = $word.Documents.Open([string]''C:\Users\morit\IdeaProjects\Eckert Enterprise\eckertdatein\7\Beispiel zu den inneren Fragen.docx''); Write-Output $doc.Content.Text; $doc.Close([bool]$false); $word.Quit() }")
